categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Blunt" was the nickname of a clone cold assault trooper who served in the Galactic Republic's Grand Army during the Clone Wars.

"Blunt" was the nickname of one of the numerous clones of Jango Fett that were created to serve the Grand Army of the Republic during Clone Wars. During the war, Blunt served under the command of Captain Sharp in the Devil Dogs, a unit of clone troopers within the 44th Special Operations Division that specialised in "explosive" missions.

In 22 BBY, during the engagement against the Separatist forces on the planet of Khorm for control over the valuable agrocite ore, Blunt was killed after his unit and Jedi Masters Plo Koon and Kit Fisto were ambushed by Asajj Ventress and her BX-series droid commandos.

Blunt was created by Henry Gilroy and Steven Melching for the second issue of the In Service of the Republic story arc of the Star Wars The Clone Wars comic series. He was drawn in the issue by Scott Hepburn.
